request.description: Use this to lookup partner IDs for channel membership/DMs.
Use this to lookup partner IDs for channel membership/DMs.
Use this to lookup partner IDs for channel membership/DMs.

body.raw:
{
    // Contact Info
    "name": "Mohamed Ahmedd",
    "email": "moha_test_002@example.com",
    "phone": "+1234567890",
    "mobile": "+1234567890",

    // Basic Info
    "gender": "male",  // Options: "male", "female"
    "birth_date": "1990-01-01",
    "marital_status": "single",  // Options: "single", "divorced", "widowed"
    "height": 175,
    "weight": 70,
    "skin_color": "medium",  // Options: "very_fair", "fair", "medium", "olive", "brown", "dark_brown"
    "body_type": "athletic",  // Options: "slim", "athletic", "average", "heavyset"

    // Location
    "country_id": 65,
    "state_id": 278,
    "city": "Cairo",

    // Religious Info
    "sect": "sunni",  // Options: "sunni", "shia", "other"
    "religious_commitment": "religious",  // Options: "very_religious", "religious", "moderate", "not_religious"
    "prayer": "always",  // Options: "always", "mostly", "sometimes", "rarely", "never"
    "smoking": "never",  // Options: "never", "occasionally", "regularly"
    "music": "no_music",  // Options: "listen", "no_music", "selective"

    // Education & Career
    "education_level": "bachelor",  // Options: "high_school", "diploma", "bachelor", "master", "phd", "other"
    "major": "Computer Science",
    "job_title": "Software Engineer",
    "company": "Tech Company",
    "income_level": "prefer_not_say",  // Options: "low", "middle", "upper_middle", "high", "prefer_not_say"

    // Family Info
    "siblings_count": 2,
    "siblings_order": 1,
    "living_with_family": true,
    "parents_alive": "both",  // Options: "both", "mother_only", "father_only", "neither"
    "family_acceptance": true,

    // Interests & Lifestyle
    "hobbies": "Reading, Hiking, Photography",
    "favorite_cuisine": "Italian, Middle Eastern",
    "sports_activity": "Running",
    "travel_preference": "Adventure travel",

    // About Me
    "bio": "Looking for a compatible partner",
    "purpose": "Building a family based on Islamic values",
    "traits": "Honest, Kind, Patient",
    "spoken_languages": "English, Arabic",

    // Visibility & Status
    "is_visible": true,
    "state": "active"  // Options: "draft", "active", "inactive", "suspended"
}

request.description: Use this to lookup partner IDs for channel membership/DMs.

body.raw:
{
  "context": {
        "lang": "ar_001" // English: en_US / Arabic: ar_001
    },
  // Pagination
  "offset": 1, // Page Number
  "limit": 10, // Page Size
  // Filteration
  "domain": [
    ["marital_status","=","single"], // "single", "divorced", "widowed"
    ["skin_color","=","medium"], // "very_fair", "fair", "medium", "olive", "brown", "dark_brown"
    ["body_type","=","athletic"], // "slim", "athletic", "average", "heavyset"
    ["education_level","=","bachelor"], // "high_school", "diploma", "bachelor", "master", "phd", "other"
    ["smoking","=","never"],  // "never", "occasionally", "regularly"
    ["prayer","=","always"],  // "always", "mostly", "sometimes", "rarely", "never"
    ["religious_commitment","=","very_religious"],  // "very_religious", "religious", "moderate", "not_religious"
    ["sect","=","sunni"]  // "sunni", "shia", "other"
  ],
  // Fields to show in the response
  "fields": 
[
    // Core Fields
    "partner_id",
    "user_id",
    
    // Basic Info
    "gender",
    "birth_date",
    "age",
    "marital_status",
    "height",
    "weight",
    "skin_color",
    "body_type",
    
    // Contact (inherited from res.partner)
    "name",
    "email",
    "phone",
    "mobile",
    
    // Location (inherited from res.partner)
    "country_id",
    "city_id",
    
    // Religious Info
    "sect",
    "religious_commitment",
    "prayer",
    "smoking",
    "music",
    
    // Education & Career
    "education_level",
    "major",
    "job_title",
    "company",
    "income_level",
    
    // Family Info
    "siblings_count",
    "siblings_order",
    "living_with_family",
    "parents_alive",
    "family_acceptance",
    
    // Interests & Lifestyle
    "hobbies",
    "favorite_cuisine",
    "sports_activity",
    "travel_preference",
    
    // About Me
    "bio",
    "purpose",
    "traits",
    "spoken_languages",
    
    // Visibility & Status
    "is_visible",
    "state",
    
    // Photos
    "photo_ids", // not yet handeled
    "photo_count"
]
}
